DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study laparoscopic hysterectomy investigate postoperative pain . Patients allocate either deep neuromuscular blockade low intra-abdominal pressure ( 8 mmHg ) moderate neuromuscular blockade usual intra-abdominal pressure ( 12 mmHg ) . Primary hypothesis : Deep neuromuscular blockade low intra-abdominal pressure ( 8 mmHg ) reduce postoperative pain compare moderate neuromuscular blockade intra-abdominal pressure ( 12 mmHg ) .
DOC.brief_title: Recovery After Laparoscopic Hysterectomy With Deep Neuromuscular Blockade Low Intra-abdominal Pressure
